description.en: The course provides an insight into topics related to the development and functioning of cities. An important role is played by experiencing oneself and thus making sense of the processes taking place in the city. The main aim of the course is to understand the changes taking place in cities and their causes from different perspectives, and to understand who the parties are, who influence urban developments and in what way. The role of communities in creating urban change and the role of cities in the context of sustainable development and climate change will also be discussed.
description.et: Õppeaine annab sissevaate linnade arengu ja toimimisega seotud teemadesse. Tähtis roll on ise kogemisel ja seeläbi linnas aset leidvate protsesside mõtestamine. Kursuse peamine eesmärk on erinevate vaatenurkade alt mõista linnades toimuvaid muutuseid ja nende põhjuseid ning saada aru, kes on osapooled, kes linnaarenguid mõjutavad ja millisel viisil. Arutletakse ka kogukondade rolli linnamuutuste loojana ning linnade rolli jätkusuutliku arengu ja kliimamuutuste kontekstis.
